document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

heading.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthribus curvipes
Germar, 1824: 176
.
Type locality:
Brazil ( type material in MLUH).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phaenithon costatus
Boheman in Schoenherr, 1833: 158
.
Type locality:
French Guiana : Cayenne ( type material in NHRS).

Phaenithon guttulatus
Fahraeus in Schoenherr, 1839: 263
.
Type locality:
Brazil ( type material in NHRS).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Mexico ; Guatemala ; Nicaragua ; Costa Rica ; Panama ( Bocas del Toro *, Chiriquí , Colón *, Darién *, Panamá *, Panamá Oeste*); Colombia ; French Guiana ; Brazil .
